About me

I am a fourth-year student majoring in Computer Science and Statistics with a minor in Mathematics. With a strong passion for problem-solving and analytical thinking, I enjoy exploring the intersection of data, algorithms, and mathematical models to uncover insights and create innovative solutions.

In my free time, I enjoy solving puzzles, exploring new technologies, and delving into creative projects, while my ultimate goal is to leverage data and technology to drive impactful innovations.

View Resume

Projects

Machine Learning Model Development

Designed, implemented, and fine-tuned machine learning models in Python utilizing industry-standard libraries such as Scikit-learn and TensorFlow. Spearheaded the development of a high-performing classification model to predict outcomes on real-world datasets, achieving superior accuracy through advanced feature engineering techniques, systematic hyperparameter optimization, and rigorous cross-validation processes. Conducted in-depth analysis and visualization of model performance using tools such as confusion matrices, precision-recall curves, ROC curves, and other key evaluation metrics. Demonstrated expertise in identifying data patterns, mitigating overfitting, and ensuring robust generalization to unseen data.

Information Security Analysis

Independently identified, analyzed, and mitigated vulnerabilities across diverse software systems, including platforms such as Windows, Kali Linux, and Ubuntu. Leveraged advanced tools and frameworks like Metasploit, Wireshark, and OpenSSL to perform comprehensive security assessments and simulate real-world attack scenarios. Executed detailed penetration testing to uncover critical security loopholes, providing strategic and actionable recommendations to strengthen system defenses against potential threats. Conducted thorough evaluations of encryption protocols, authentication mechanisms, and system configurations to ensure adherence to industry security standards and best practices. Demonstrated proficiency in securing complex environments while enhancing system resilience through systematic risk assessment and remediation.

See Live Source Code

Data Analysis

Utilized advanced data analysis libraries such as Pandas, Matplotlib, and NumPy to efficiently manage, manipulate, and visualize complex datasets. Demonstrated expertise in importing and cleaning diverse datasets, computing key statistical measures, and deriving actionable insights through in-depth analysis. Developed interactive and visually compelling data visualizations, including bar plots, line charts, scatter plots, and heatmaps, to effectively communicate findings to stakeholders. Optimized workflows for large-scale data processing, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in every stage of analysis.
